sentence: The aggressive and lytic nature of the tumor can lead to varying degrees of vertebral compression ranging from mild to outright vertebral plana (Figure 1).
The cortex displays thinning or complete eradication, in which case there is an extension of the tumor into the surrounding soft tissue (Figure 2).

Aoki et al. showed, in a review of 10 MRI of GCT of the spine, that haemosiderin deposition shows nodular, zonal, whorled, or diffuse low signal intensity on all sequence images with low intensity further exaggerated on T2 images (Figure 3).
Histologically, GCT of the spine presents as a spindle cell stroma with multiple multi-nucleated osteoclastic giant cells (Figure 4).
After treatment with denosumab and resection, a micrograph of tissues harvested showed a fibrous matrix with no multinucleated giant cells (Figure 5).
After 26 months, there was no progression of disease and a radiographic evaluation showed a decrease in tumor size and formation of new cortical bone [39] (Figure 6 and Figure 7.
There appears to be mild retropulsion of L5 vertebral body.Figure 7.
Our proposed diagnosis and treatment algorithm is presented below in Figure 8.
